publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3170 Mr Stewart Maxwell: Congratulations to "Best Company"â€”That the Parliament congratulates Livingston-based company, W L Gore & Associates, for coming top of the 2005 Sunday Times "Best Companies to Work For" list; notes that this is the second year in a row that it has been top of this list and that this is the first time that a company has achieved this; commends the company as an example of what can be achieved by good working practices and innovative thinking, and believes that more companies should follow its example.
S2M-3170 Congratulations to "Best Company" (lodged on 19 August 2005) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Fiona Hyslop*
